mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, username, password, face_image, face_image_big, nick_name, qrcode, cid, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faceImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faceImageBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update user_info set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, face_image = #{faceImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, face_image_big = #{faceImageBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, username, password, face_image, face_image_big, nick_name, qrcode, cid, is_deleted from user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, username, password, face_image, face_image_big, nick_name, qrcode, cid, is_deleted from user_info
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, username, password, face_image, face_image_big, nick_name, qrcode, cid, is_deleted from user_info where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deleted = 0
